Text:

Name: TruthGundlach
Text: Fed message today was essentially: the case for easing has strengthened, we hope that changes soon, if it doesn’t we’re behind the curve.

Name: TruthGundlach
Text: The film “Kusama Infinity” is a profile in courage,  genius, perseverance & acceptance against all odds. Highly recommended. Love you Yayoi!
